description: Jakarta EE 10 is packed with new features for building modernized, simplified, and lightweight cloud native Java applications.

technologies.name: Servlet
technologies.description: Jakarta Servlet defines a server-side API for handling HTTP requests and responses.

technologies.name: Enterprise Beans
technologies.description: Jakarta Enterprise Beans defines an architecture for the development and deployment of component-based business applications.

technologies.name: Persistence
technologies.description: Jakarta Persistence defines a standard for management of persistence and object/relational mapping in Java(R) environments.
